instructions:
Remove sausage from casing, break up and brown in a 6-quart pot with onions. Drain most of grease.
Add tomatoes with liquid, broth’s, water and seasonings. Heat to boiling and reduce heat. Cover and simmer
for 1 1/4 hours. Add the garbanzo beans and simmer for 5 minutes, then the Italian beans and zucchini and
continue simmering for 5 minutes. Makes about 5 1/2 quarts of soup. 
*(Rev. 7/31/93)*
ingredients: 2 large green peppers, seeded and cut into 3/4 inch strips and halved, (1 red and 1 green pepper if
2 cans (15 oz ea) stewed tomatoes, cut up
1 can (15 oz) Italian green beans, drained
name: Italian Vegetable Soup
creator: Jim Decker
